Mindful Practices: Course 2
Introduction to SEL

Support SEL for Students

CASEL identifies four SEL Implementation Focus Areas. In this course, we will bring attention to supporting SEL for students. This is an important first step before we can bring SEL to our students, as intuitively we know that educators cannot teach what they cannot model.

1

Build Foundational Support Plan

2

Strengthen Adult SEL Competencies and Capacity

3

Promote SEL for Students

4

Reflect on Data for Continuous Improvement

Source: Leading school-based teams through a process for systemic SEL implementation.
